page.title: 06A DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content: Today is Wednesday.My mum is calling me.I slowly get out of bed.I wash myself and get dressed.For breakfast I have a weetabix,two sandwiches with lemon curd in and some orange squash.I call for my friend Kathy and we go to school together. When we get in the classroom we do lots of lessons. At dinner time I play French skipping with Kathryn and Amanda.In the afternoon we go to sewing class. I finish off my patchwork by tacking round the edges. Then we play rounders. When I arrive home I get changed and go to Magnets, a club for children of my age.I make a model cat.After a drink and a biscuit I go home with my mum and go to bed.
